item.title: Using R and Vim together
item.description: Turn Vim into an R IDE For some time I have been useing vim and R together and I am very happy with that solution. In this post I just want to describe how it works. What is an IDE IDE is the abbreviation for “integrated development environment”. To keep it simple IDE is a working environment to solve coding tasks. On Wikipedia you can find a full explanation. Why don’t I use R Studio?
